phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
You do not even know your Zanpaku-tos name.
And you think you can fight me as an equal?
Well, it is 2000 years too soon!
You will lose to Renji Abarai, and die on this spot!
But that is what is known as a difference in strength.
The Zanpaku-to changes in size and shape
depending on its wielder's spiritual energy.
And this is the manifestation of my spiritual energy!
Well kid, I think it is about time I got going.
I do not like the air here.
One attack will show him the difference in strength,
make him realize that he has no chance,
and back down while his wound is not serious.
But Ichigo would never give up because of such a reason.
Are you trying to deepen your guilt?!
You still have the strength to move?
I was just thinking that it is no fun
to finish off someone who cannot move anymore.
Well then, fight hard and die!
Ichigo, if you can stand, get away!
If you will not attack, I will!
What is this sudden increase in his Spiritual Pressure!
He was about to die earlier!
Where did he get all this power?
Your moves have slowed down considerably.
I do not understand this, but it feels good.
I do not even feel the pain from the wound!
And I do not feel like I can lose!
You are good at dodging around!
How much higher can his spiritual energy go?!
But that is about to end.
I will not make it in time
No he did not do anything.
He cannot do a thing from that distance.
I cannot even tell if I was hit from the back
It is been awhile since I saw it, but he is awesome, after all.
I had to strain to follow his second attack.
when he drew his sword, or put it back.
If I could not see it coming
He probably does not even know what happened to him.
What was that extraordinary Spiritual Pressure he demonstrated earlier?
No You did not need to help me with a kid of this level, Captain.
If all I did was watch each time
No, this man is And I am
By just touching him, your sentence will increase by 20 years!
Why would you multiply your crimes for a dead person?!
I am the one who got Ichigo involved in this.
It is my fault he is dead!
So what is wrong with my coming to him?!
So even if it would make your sentence harsher,
you cannot stay away... from this kid?
This kidlooks a lot like him.
This kidlooks a lot like him.
Quit talking about me like I am not here!
Look at me when you speak!
I see You do not need that arm, huh?
How dare you grab my brother like that?!
Through his actions just now I, Rukia Kuchiki, have opened my eyes.
Please take me back to the Soul Society.
I will atone for my sins.
You do not know when to give up, do you?
There is no need to inflict the final blow upon him.
Leave him and he will eventually die on his own.
What kind of joke is this?!
Take even one step from there
so stay there and live, even if just one second longer.
I will not inflict the finishing blow.
With the two attacks just now, I have shattered his Soul Chain
and Hakusui - Soul Sleep, the vital spots of the soul.
He should die in less than an hour.
And even if he does survive, his powers will be lost,
Soul Reaper power, as well as his spiritual energy.
Oh no, am I about to die?
I probably do not feel pain because I am on the verge of death.
That is right my body was so cold earlier, but I am feeling warmth now.
Why are you under the covers with me?!
And this is not my house.
You must not be up, Kurosaki.
Your wounds have not closed yet.
You will die if you move around too much.
It sounds as though you did not want me to rescue you.
Oh yeah Ishida was there, too.
He lost a lot of blood, but his wounds were not too serious.
Even if he lay there like that,
he would not have died for a couple of days.
So I was able to treat most of his wounds there.
He was worried about you when he left.
I asked him to rest here awhile
But rather please take care of Kurosaki.
If there is anyone who can defeat those guys right now, it is not me.
The only one who can save Rukia
What does he expect me to do?
Rukia has gone back to the Soul Society!
How do I go after her?!
No way can I do that
There is a way to get to the Soul Society
Of course, I will tell you.
For the next ten days, study how to fight with me.
Rukia may be executed over there at any time!
We have to get to the Soul Society and!
You just do not get it, do you?
What I mean is, if you go there now, you will die.
If you fought with them now?
This time, I let you try and fight them.
That is because I figured you would understand that better than words.
With your level of strength now,
you will not be of any good in the Soul Society.
A weak person entering the enemy's den that is called suicide.
Do not use others as a reason for walking straight into death's arms.
has a one-month waiting period before an execution.
This holds true in Rukia's case, too.
It is different from the way humans are executed, though.
I have ten days to bully you.
Then seven days to open the gate to Soul Society.
And 13 days after we arrive in Soul Society.
We will have lots of time.
Can I become stronger in ten days?
That is if you truly wish to save Rukia from the bottom of your heart.
Your feelings are stronger than steel.
Can you play a game of life and death with me?
I felt as thoughthe rain stopped.
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I was casually walking through town
Around the time dusk fell and the city was bathed in red
It was an afternoon with crowds of people coming and going
I do not know why but I just stood there and watched
Then my cell phone started to vibrate and I made myself move
hoping it could fill in this hole in my heart
We got to hold each other up
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
Renji Abarai shows you the Proper way to use the Zanpaku-to!
First, you call out the name of your Zanpaku-to to release its power!
Slash, and slash, and slash, and slash!
